Text.Page:
My nestbrothers will never let us near Sikander, nor the temple. They've forgotten their mission, their sacred duty!

You must kill the sikandari defenders and weaken the heretics.

Bring back their crests. They don't deserve to wear them any longer.

I grieve for my nestbrothers, but Sikander would never sanction the deaths of your people for his sake.

Don't let their deaths be in vain, .
Did you deal with the defenders already?
